scenario.name: SUBSCRIBE/UNSUBSCRIBE
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$uac_number]@[domain]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[domain]:[remote_port]>;tag=[pid] To: [$uac_number] <sip:[$uac_number]@[domain]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[$uac_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 2000 Event: ua-profile Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 202 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_Record-Route:] [last_To:];tag=[pid] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:SRCNO@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0
